contentList.content: ! Class: Barbarian
A character who harnesses their fury to punish foes.
! Subclass: Berserker Barbarian
A Barbarian who follows a path of untrammelled fury and thrills in the chaos of battle, regardless of their own well-being.
! Subclass: Giant Barbarian
A Barbarian who invokes their elemental might and size by drawing strength from the primal giants.
! Subclass: Wild Magic Barbarian
A Barbarian suffused with the wild influence of arcane power waiting to be released.
! Subclass: Wildheart Barbarian
A Barbarian sharing a supernatural bond with nature, channeling the power of beasts.
! Class: Bard
A character with a versatile skillset, who blends artistry, trickery, and spellcraft.
! Subclass: College of Glamour Bard
A Bard who mastered their craft under the tutelage of fey creatures and can harness their captivating magic to charm their foes.
! Subclass: College of Lore Bard
A Bard who blends magic, wit, and scholarship into a versatile and unpredictable force.
! Subclass: College of Swords Bard
A Bard who turns combat into performance, striking with style, speed, and precision.
! Subclass: College of Valor Bard
A Bard who inspires bravery and leads with blade and song in the heart of battle.
! Class: Cleric
A character of faith, channeling divine magic both to aid and harm.
! Subclass: Death Domain Cleric
A Cleric who nourishes their faith on the forces that create the dead, giving rise to the undead.
! Subclass: Life Domain Cleric
A Cleric who nurtures and protects, channeling radiant energy to heal and uplift.
! Subclass: Light Domain Cleric
A Cleric who channels searing light to purify, protect, and punish.
! Subclass: Knowledge Domain Cleric
A Cleric who seeks the wisdom of the gods, using knowledge to enlighten and defend.
! Subclass: Nature Domain Cleric
A Cleric who serves both deity and wilderness, blending divine magic with the rhythms of nature.
! Subclass: Tempest Domain Cleric
A Cleric who strikes with tempestuous might, standing at the eye of divine chaos.
! Subclass: Trickery Domain Cleric
A Cleric who bends perception and fate, hiding divine purpose behind clever lies.
! Subclass: War Domain Cleric
A Cleric who thrives in battle, calling upon divine might to strike hard and stand firm.
! Class: Druid
A character who commands the forces of nature, shaping the world with primal magic.
! Subclass: Circle of the Land Druid
A Druid who draws deep power from the land itself, shaped by the terrain they call home.
! Subclass: Circle of the Moon Druid
A Druid who specializes in Wild Shaping into massive beasts or even primal elementals.
! Subclass: Circle of the Spores Druid
A Druid who uses fungal growth and decay to augment themselves and harm their foes.
! Subclass: Circle of the Stars Druid
A Druid who is guided by the infinite mysteries of the cosmos, using their understanding of the stars to enhance their druidic magic.
! Class: Fighter
A character who has mastered weapons and tactics, excelling in martial combat.
! Subclass: Arcane Archer Fighter
An archer who studied a unique elven method of archery that weaves magic into attacks to produce supernatural effects.
! Subclass: Battle Master Fighter
A paragon of tactical superiority, who can employ a wide array of combat manoeuvres to dominate every fight.
! Subclass: Champion Fighter
A Fighter who perfects the fundamentals of combat, turning every strike into a display of raw mastery.
! Subclass: Eldritch Knight Fighter
A warrior of spell and sword who weaves incantations to supplement their martial expertise.
! Class: Monk
A character who disciplines body and spirit, moving with speed, precision, and inner focus.
! Subclass: Way of the Drunken Master Monk
A Monk who frustrates foes with carefully executed movements concealed beneath a facade of incompetence.
! Subclass: Way of the Four Elements Monk
A Monk who uses their ki to bend the elements to their will.
! Subclass: Way of the Open Hand Monk
A Monk who refines each strike into a disciplined force, overwhelming foes with precision.
! Subclass: Way of Shadow Monk
A Monk who weaves through darkness, mastering stealth, illusion, and swift, unseen strikes.
! Class: Paladin
A character who upholds or neglects a sacred oath, a warrior of divinity or demise.
! Class: Oath of the Ancients Paladin
A Paladin who defends the light of life and beauty, standing against despair and decay.
! Class: Oath of the Crown Paladin
A Paladin who is sworn to the ideals of civilization and is dedicated to the just laws that hold society together.
! Subclass: Oath of Devotion Paladin
A Paladin who acts with honour and virtue to protect the weak and pursue the greater good.
! Subclass: Oath of Vengeance Paladin
A Paladin who set aside their own purity to right wrongs and deliver justice by any means necessary.
! Subclass: Oathbreaker Paladin
A Paladin who broke their Oath in pursuit of power and ambition.
! Class: Ranger
A character who thrives in the wilds, blending survival instinct with deadly precision.
! Subclass: Beast Master Ranger
A Ranger who can summon an animal companion to aid them in combat.
! Subclass: Gloom Stalker Ranger
A Ranger who thrives in the shadows, striking first and unseen in the darkest places.
! Subclass: Hunter Ranger
A Ranger who excels at slaying the most dangerous prey.
! Subclass: Swarmkeeper Ranger
A Ranger who has formed a magical bond with a swarm of nature spirits.
! Class: Rogue
A character who excels in stealth, strategy, and quick thinking.
! Subclass: Arcane Trickster Rogue
A Rogue who weaves magic into their mischief, bending reality to enhance their cunning.
! Subclass: Assassin Rogue
A Rogue who blends disguise, poison, and precision to eliminate targets before they're aware.
! Subclass: Swashbuckler Rogue
A Rogue whose training in the art of the blade allows them to excel in single combat, relying on speed, elegance, and charm in equal parts.
! Subclass: Thief Rogue
A Rogue who turns nimbleness and nerve into an unmatched edge in any situation.
! Class: Sorcerer
A character with raw arcane power, shaping magic through will alone.
! Subclass: Draconic Bloodline Sorcerer
A Sorcerer whose blood carries the legacy of dragons, manifesting in powerful and resilient magic.
! Subclass: Wild Magic Sorcerer
A Sorcerer whose spells sometimes twist reality in strange and unexpected ways.
! Subclass: Shadow Sorcerer
A Sorcerer siphons their powers from the Shadowfell itself.
! Subclass: Storm Sorcery Sorcerer
A Sorcerer whose presence crackles with thunder and fury, a living conduit of the storm's wrath.
! Class: Warlock
A character who wields eldritch magic granted by a supernatural patron.
! Subclass: The Archfey Warlock
A Warlock who serves a capricious fey patron, mastering charm, illusion, and misdirection.
! Subclass: The Fiend Warlock
A Warlock who bargains with fiends to unleash devastating power.
! Subclass: The Great Old One Warlock
A Warlock who touches the mind of an unknowable entity, speaking secrets not meant for mortals.
! Subclass: The Hexblade Warlock
A Warlock who made a pact with a mysterious entity from the Shadowfell, which anifests in sentient magic weapons carved from the stuff of shadows.
! Class: Wizard
A character who masters the weave through study and intellect.
! Subclass: Abjuration School Wizard
A Wizard who masters wards and barriers, standing firm against magical and mundane threats.
! Subclass: Bladesinging School Wizard
A Wizard who has mastered swordplay and wizardry, combining the elegant manoeuvres of a warrior with the devastating magics of a mage.
! Subclass: Conjuration School Wizard
A Wizard who summons creatures and objects from thin air, commanding forces from across the planes.
! Subclass: Divination School Wizard
A Wizard who peers into the future, bending fate through insight and foresight.
! Subclass: Enchantment School Wizard
A Wizard who twists minds and emotions, weaving spells of charm, command, and domination.
! Subclass: Evocation School Wizard
A Wizard who unleashes pure destructive magic.
! Subclass: Illusion School Wizard
A Wizard who manipulates perception, crafting shadows and phantoms to deceive and disorient.
! Subclass: Necromancy School Wizard
A Wizard who bends mortality itself, wielding death as both a weapon and a shield.
! Subclass: Transmutation School Wizard
A Wizard who alters the fabric of existence, changing what is into what could be.

Blessed with the favour of a goddess, Nightsong cannot be permanently killed. When unconscious, Nightsong can regain 1 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag> if she succeeds a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> at the beginning of her turn.
Malus Thorm can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Surgeon">Multiattack</LSTag> if his <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> are at 60% or less.
Brutish Finesse
The previous wielder of this weapon controlled it with grace, for a moment you wonder how they did it...
Finishing Strike

This fragment of Myrkul's realm restores [1] to Undead and deals [2] to living creatures at the end of their turns in the area. Additonally, living creatures have halved <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> and cannot regain[3].

This living creature takes [1] at the end of every turn, has halved <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> and cannot regain[2] while it is within <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHA_NECROMANCER_LANDOFTHEDEAD_AURA">The Dead Wastes</LSTag>.
